about.title: About Us
about.intro: Hi, We are Hristo and Michael, junior full-stack developers based in Bulgaria and United Kingdom with a background in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Telecommunications and a passion for building user-centric web applications.
about.learning: We started learning to code in 2019, transitioning from general computer science to software development. After completing Bachelor's degree in our courses of study, We began working on real-world projects using Next.js and React.js.
about.specialization: We specialize in full-stack development, crafting fast and easy-to-use web applications. We're currently working at many interesting projects, where we contribute to dynamic systems and continuously grow our skills.
about.hobbies: Outside of coding, We enjoy being active, and we're exploring Artifical Intelligence to bring creativity into our projects.

skills.webDevDesc: Building fast and easy-to-use web applications with Next.js and React.js
skills.fullStackDesc: End-to-end solutions from database to frontend
skills.design3DDesc: Expanding computer capabilities everywhere with dynamic Android applications

skills.title: Tech Stack
skills.stripe: Payment processing platform for online businesses
skills.vercel: Deployment and hosting platform for Next.js applications
skills.tsql: SQL dialect for Microsoft SQL Server

hvac.title: 15-viki-bg HVAC Platform
hvac.description: Professional HVAC e-commerce platform with product management, order processing, installation scheduling, and administrative tools.
details: Full-stack e-commerce platform for HVAC services
Product catalog with filtering and search functionality
Order management system with payment processing
Installation scheduling and customer inquiry management
Admin dashboard with analytics and CRUD operations
Multi-language support (Bulgarian/English)
Responsive design for all devices

aseam.title: ASEA-M Detailing Studio
aseam.description: Modern car detailing studio website with appointment booking system, service showcase, and professional contact management.
details: Professional car detailing studio website with dark theme and yellow accents
Appointment booking system with email integration for customer requests
Service showcase with detailed descriptions and pricing
Multi-language support (Bulgarian/English) with language switcher
Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop devices
Contact form with email notifications to business owner
Modern UI with graffiti-inspired design elements

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: Working on new exciting projects currently. More details coming soon!
details: New project details will be revealed soon

scla.title: SCLA (Star City Living App)
scla.description: Resident management system for handling subscriptions, prepaid packages, and resident profiles.
details: Built searchable and paginated tables using Laravel and Vue 3
Created Excel export features with filters by status (Active, Inactive, Rejected)
Implemented tabbed interfaces and reset logic for seamless UX

synpitarn.title: Synpitarn Loan Management System
synpitarn.description: Inherited and refactored legacy code to support modern queue jobs and bulk data processing.
details: Created background jobs for Excel exports and SMS/notification handling
Enhanced the admin dashboard for better user control over loan applications

password.title: Password Expiration & Security Flow
password.description: Enforced a 90-day password expiration policy with scheduled email alerts.
details: Set up password_changed_at tracking, login restrictions, and password reuse prevention
Created custom email notifications instead of Laravel's default notification system

portfolio3d.title: 3D Portfolio + Creative Designs
portfolio3d.description: Currently designing a 3D-themed dark portfolio with Blender models and glassmorphism UI.
details: Exploring Three.js integration and 3D asset display in a web context

sarah.name: Snezhana
sarah.content: Thanks to Hristo and Michael, I think we are on our way to doing something big and changing the way people view and use our services.

aychin.name: Aychin
aychin.content: I am extremely satisfied! Communication with H&M Website Provisioning is super easy, constructive and the results show it! I strongly recommend and keep going forward guys!

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.intro: Have a project in mind or want to discuss a potential collaboration? Feel free to reach out using the contact form or through any of our social channels.
